info.description:
There are four products made available under Insights (Enterprise) for businesses  
seeking to leverage Aiiaâ€™s license for account information services.

1. **Account Owner Verification:** Verify bank account ownership in real-time  
    leveraging our open banking account information service which retrieves the  
    account holder's name, account number and produces a name match  
    comparison score. Name matching is optional.
2. **Balance Check:** Retrieve the available and booked balance in real-time to  
    check for sufficient funds in an account or streamline affordability  
    assessments.
3. **Transaction Categorization:** Make sense of messy data by using the  
    Categorization endpoint to enrich your transactions and return up to 3 levels  
    of granularity. Data can be ingested via either using our open banking hosted  
    flow or through the Bring Your Data endpoint. Once categorized, and enriched,  
    the transactional data can be more easily processed, understood and leveraged to  
    help address your use case.
4. **Verification of Income:** Verify an individuals income in real time by leveraging  
    our open banking service which provides detailed insights for lenders  
    to compliment their existing affordability assessments.
